item.title: Pull request #466 created
item.description:
460: Fix math symbols

(1) drops the mathematical operator symbols appendix, which allowed an extensive range of non-ASCII characters as synonyms for language keywords, (2) retains ร and รท as synonyms for multiplication and division, (3) allows full-width < and > in operator symbols in place of the usual ASCII characters, to avoid the need for XML escaping.
